attributes.action: Urge UK Government to Condemn Horrific LGBT+ Concentration Camps of Chechnya
attributes.additional_details:
Some links to recent news articles:

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/chechnya-ramzan-kadyrov-gay-citizens-massacre-chechen-leader-do-not-exist-russia-vladimir-putin-a7675906.html

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4397118/Chechnya-opens-concentration-camp-homosexuals.html
attributes.background: Recently there have been reports of the detainment and execution of LGBT+ men by order of Chechnyan leader Ramzan Kadyrov. This has deeply shocked me and although it is not happening in this country, it is a direct attack on the entire LGBT+ community and their rights and must be publicly condemned.
